Judul: Robust footstep identification system based on acoustic local features
Abstrak:
Footsteps, as a main kind of behavioural trait are a universally available signal. However, it remains a challenging
problem to construct a robust footstep authentication system. Since, in practise, footsteps are usually accompanied with noisy and environmental sounds, it is difficult to extract stable footstep features from the mixed sounds. This study describes a novel robust footstep identification system. To extract stable features from the footsteps mixed with noisy or environmental sounds, a robust acoustic local feature extraction method is proposed.
